channel.title: reproducible-research on Sam Abbott
channel.description: Recent content in reproducible-research on Sam Abbott

item.title: prettypublisher
item.description: prettypublisher is an R package that aims to improve your workflow by allowing an easier transition from literate code to a paper draft ready for journal submission.

item.title: tbinenglanddataclean
item.description: R package containing the scripts required to clean data from the Enhanced Tuberculosis Surveillance system, and the Labour Force Survey, and to then calculate Tuberculosis incidence.
